abstract: Update | 6:40 p.m. Newly filed court documents show that Bernard L. Madoff, who pleaded guilty to running a vast multibillion-dollar Ponzi scheme, and his wife lived a lavish lifestyle, owning several boats, homes and other assets valued at more than $823 million at the end of last year.
